sentence: Former presidential candidate Marianne Williamson endorsed Outagamie County Executive Tom Nelson in Wisconsin's Democratic Senate primary on Monday, calling Nelson "the candidate with the truest progressive vision."
author: Julia Manchester
title: Marianne Williamson endorses Tom Nelson in Wisconsin Senate race
